title: Shaza, Dr Jack Lau discuss matters of mutual interest
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 12 (APP): Minister of State for IT and Telecommunication Shaza Fatima Khawaja and President Qatar Science and Technology Park Dr Jack Lau on Friday discussed matters of mutual interest and regarding start-up ecosystem and innovation.
During a meeting Dr Jack Lau briefed Shaza Fatima about Qatar Science and Technology Park and said that slightly large companies from Pakistan are encouraged to establish a strong physical presence in Qatar, as it would facilitate their expansion and provide them with a strategic base in Middle East.
He urged Pakistani entrepreneurs to come and work on cutting-edge foundational technologies in Qatar, saying that these opportunities are being provided by several unicorns that are setting up operations in Qatar.
Shaza Fatima said present government was taking steps for promoting entrepreneurship and innovation in the country. She said Prime Minister of Pakistan was focused upon equipping youth with latest tech training and their capacity building.
She said youth of Pakistan has great potential and talent, adding that start-ups exchange program can be started between Qatar and Pakistan.
Ignite and Qatar Science and Technology Park can jointly work regarding this exchange program.The minister also stressed upon arranging visit of Pakistani students in Qatar to Qatar Science and Technology Park. Both Pakistan and Qatar can benefit from each otherâ€™s experiences in tech sector.Additional Secretary MoITT, Aisha Humera Moriani was also present in the meeting.
